name: Jilin-1 Remote Sensing Store (CGSTL)
desc: Public discovery entry for CGSTL imagery (VHR optical). Coverage density can be non-uniform.

name: Land Observation Satellite Data Service (CRESDA)
desc: Public search entry for China's GF/ZY/HJ/LT/Carbon missions (optical/SAR/atmosphere, mission-dependent).

name: SASClouds (Natural Resources Remote Sensing Cloud Platform)
desc: Public search entry for GF/ZY and some other datasets. For GF/ZY, treat CRESDA as the primary reference.

name: Siwei Earth Store (HighJing series)
desc: Discovery entry (official portal may require registration; this tool does not depend on login and does not place orders).

name: Airbus Intelligence Ordering / Archive
desc: Public entry for SPOT 6/7, Pleiades, TerraSAR-X, etc. This tool does not order or guarantee availability.

name: Apollo Mapping ImageHunter (Aggregator)
desc: Aggregator discovery entry (WV/IKONOS/QuickBird/GeoEye/Planet/SkySat, SPOT/Pleiades/NEO, KOMPSAT, EROS, RapidEye, Deimos-2, etc.). Catalog completeness may vary.

name: Planet Explorer
desc: Planet discovery entry (often requires an account; this tool does not depend on login and does not place orders).

name: ALOS Platform (ALOS-2 / ALOS-4 SAR)
desc: Public entry for ALOS-2 and ALOS-4 SAR datasets (ALOS-1 removed).

name: OBT Data Platform (Orbita)
desc: Public discovery entry for 1m/2m optical and 10m hyperspectral products.

name: Capella Open Data (AWS Open Data)
desc: Public SAR sample dataset (AWS Open Data). Samples only; not a comprehensive archive.

name: NASA GIBS Docs (WMTS/WMS/TWMS/TMS)
desc: Public documentation for NASA GIBS visualization services (time-enabled layers).

name: NASA GIBS Visualization Product Catalog
desc: Catalog of GIBS layers, projections, time dimensions, and formats.
